PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-08842007-06-04,  ,  TC,  , 
ActPilotage Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of JULIUS B. SPIVACK of Hampstead, Quebec, as a member of the Laurentian Pilotage Authority to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Robert Rocheleau; and appointment of JULIUS B. SPIVACK of Hampstead, Quebec, to be part-time Vice-Chairman of the Laurentian Pilotage Authority; effective June 30, 2007.
